metadata.dc:author: Alejo, M
Ramos Pérez, P L
Rodríguez Sánchez, A
Sánchez Segura, A
metadata.dc:description: We display a case of a female patient with a pleomorphic adenoma localized in the nasal fossa, with 10 years of evolution and that has been extirpated by an external way. We review the bibliography, we emphasize the rareness of the locality and make considerations about clinic, prognostication and treatment.
metadata.dc:title: Adenoma pleomorfo de fosa nasal. Aportación de un caso.
[Pleomorphic adenoma of the nasal cavity. Presentation of a case].
